title: 00165 won't load macOS after liquid damage
message:
Hi!

I've got a 00165 board which got liquid damaged. I've  [URL='https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1RBxhlv06pLKP2YhhDWZkPxxgXmFmbPIg?usp=sharing']attached [/URL]screenshots of the main places I found corrosion
Thing is, after cleaning up the corrosion in these areas and putting the board through ultrasonic, it power up just fine but will crash when loading macOS, showing a black screen with the backlight still on for a while before shutting down completely
Unfortunately, in verbose mode it seems to crash right when switching from the wall of text to the Apple logo, so I don't really get any useful info from that.
I've tried flashing a clean BIOS, and even replacing the SMC from another 00165 board, but I get the same exact behaviour.
Funny enough, when booting High Sierra I never get to the login screen, whereas on Catalina it seems to sometimes get to the login screen or desktop and then crash a minute later.

At first I thought this might be an iGPU problem, but I installed Windows, including the Intel HD6000 driver from Windows update, and I can run Heaven for long times without a single crash.
I've also completed multiple runs of memtest86 without any errors. 

Kind of running out of ideas on this one after checking it over for a few days, so would love to know if anyone has some advice?

Thank you

title: 00165 won't load macOS after liquid damage
message:
Did you try SMC bypass and safe mode?
Also test booting USB preinstalled macOS.

title: 00165 won't load macOS after liquid damage
message:
Tried SMC bypass and get the same thing, will try safe mode
I've been testing with my external macOS SSD but it does the same with a known good internal drive

title: 00165 won't load macOS after liquid damage
message:
Got the same behaviour when booting in safe mode(shift held down)
Laptop will show apple logo and loading bar but eventually go to a black screen with backlight still on, then later powers off completely.

Any way that I can find some sort of log of what is happening? Again, laptop crashes after verbose boot changes to apple logo which is no help

Thanks

title: 00165 won't load macOS after liquid damage
message:
I had similar problem with 3437 and 00165 nproblem; not fixed.
There is something wrong with Intel Management Engine.
May need to change CPU.
